description: Aero Watch provides all your necessary aviation instruments - right on your wrist!See details & features at: http://aero.watch/Aero Watch provides the following instruments on your watch, mobile & tablet:* Altimeter* Attitude Indicator* Heading Indicator* Speed Indicator* Vertical Speed Indicator* Turn & Slip Indicator* Clock & Stop watch* GPS raw data* RMI* CDI* HSIAero Watch Pro includes a navigation database with global coverage for airports & navaids. descriptionHTML:
Aero Watch provides all your necessary aviation instruments - right on your wrist!

See details & features at: http://aero.watch/

Aero Watch provides the following instruments on your watch, mobile & tablet:

* Altimeter
* Attitude Indicator
* Heading Indicator
* Speed Indicator
* Vertical Speed Indicator
* Turn & Slip Indicator
* Clock & Stop watch
* GPS raw data
* RMI
* CDI
* HSI

Aero Watch Pro includes a navigation database with global coverage for airports & navaids. See where you're headed through an RMI, CDI or HSI-style interface.

Aero Watch Pro can connect to an iLevil SW or AW AHRS, and show your aircrafts attitude & position.

The application runs on a regular phone & tablet as well, with the same features as on the watch.

For detailed documentation, visit our web site at http://aero.watch/
comments: Crashes Haven't gotten any functionality.  Crashed every single time I tried to open it.
recentChanges: added track up, north up and OBS modes
